abstracts.cdata!:
The Third LBDI Project will help LBDI
            finance the foreign costs of investment during the period
            1977 to mid-1979 in productive enterprises in manufacturing,
            agriculture, transportation, tourism and services. The
            project also provides for technical assistance to LBDI.
